Comment: Not to be flippant... but its going to be tough as fast as things are moving.  Given Trump and Trudeau have a call at 3p eastern today, the entire "trade war with Canada and Mexico" could be over by EOD.  Best bet would probably be finding two good news sources - the Economist is a good place to start, but also look at right-leaning media as well (you can find versions/evaluations cross the internet.  Here's [Allsides's](https://www.allsides.com/media-bias/media-bias-chart) breakdown.)  I'd also throw in a bit more opinion sites, especially those that tend to update their news more frequently.  Again, both sides so you can get an idea of what each is focusing on.  Reddit, unfortunately, is probably too slow right now to really track things.  One of the top stories right now is the stock market falling but after the resolution with Mexico, its recovered almost all its loses.  Its just the way reddit is designed.
